This website is AudioEye enabled and is being optimized for accessibility. To open the AudioEye Toolbar, press "shift + =". Some assistive technologies may require the use of a passthrough function before this keystroke. For more information, activate the button labeled “Explore your accessibility options”.

Government
==========

9

1

1

2

1. #### [Agendas and Minutes](https://www.budatx.gov/390/Agendas-and-Minutes)

   Granicus iframe for live streaming and archived City Council, Boards and Commission meeting agendas and recordings.
2. #### [City Council](https://www.budatx.gov/102/City-Council)

   View information on the Buda City Council.
3. #### [Boards & Commissions](https://www.budatx.gov/95/Boards-Commissions)

   Browse through information on our city boards and commissions.
4. #### [Code of Ordinances](https://www.budatx.gov/399)

   Look up city ordinances online.
5. #### [Bid & Procurement Notices](https://www.budatx.gov/137)
6. #### [Elections](https://www.budatx.gov/258/Elections)
7. #### [Governmental Resources and Social Services](https://www.budatx.gov/122/Governmental-Resources-and-Social-Servic)

   Look through other governmental resources for citizens of Buda.
8. #### [Notary Public Services](https://www.budatx.gov/257/Notary-Public-Services)
9. #### [Public Notices](https://www.budatx.gov/339/Public-Notices)
10. #### [Transparency](https://www.budatx.gov/1024/Transparency)
11. #### [Unified Development Code (UDC)](https://ecode360.com/40133520)

    Link to the City's Unified Development Code (UDC).

### Contact Us

1. City of Buda
2. 405. E Loop Street, Building 100
3. Buda, TX 78610
4. Phone: [512-312-0084](tel:512-312-0084)
5. Monday - Thursday, 8 a.m. - 5 p.m.
6. Friday, 8 am - 4 pm
